rows.label: qev092905_MSG0010
rows.name:
This is...[ST:wide ]— Just as I thought.
I had a feeling it might be something like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0020
rows.name:
But why is it in a place like this,
like the outer frontiers of space?[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ah, sorry.
I should explain it properly to you too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0040
rows.name: First, the true identity of that giant ring structure is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0045
rows.name: A planetary environmental modification system[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0050
rows.name: A so-called terraforming device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0060
rows.name: But what's more important than that is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0070
rows.name:
that Qlurian star system technology
is used in that giant ring[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0080
rows.name:
Qlurian technology is heavily influenced
by the universe's oldest civilization[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0085
rows.name: "Ancient Samaar."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0090
rows.name:
Those benefits led to faith in Ancient Samaar,
and the Qlu flourished for several thousand years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0100
rows.name:
Our ancestors, seeking to spread this wonderful faith,
proselytized to other civilizations, sharing Qlurian technology along with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0110
rows.name:
The alien civilization that built this giant ring
was one of those they preached to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0120
rows.name: Although, seeing the tragic state of this desolate land...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0125
rows.name: It seems the technology wasn't used correctly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0130
rows.name:
To think that technology given to nurture life
would be diverted into weaponry[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_JNK0140
rows.name: Be Sympathetic

rows.label: qev092905_SEL0150
rows.name: Offer words of comfort.

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0160
rows.name: Heh. You're kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0170
rows.name:
If Qlurian technology
had fallen into the hands of someone like you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0180
rows.name: It probably wouldn't have ended up like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_JNK0190
rows.name: Be Pragmatic

rows.label: qev092905_SEL0200
rows.name: Tell her that reality is cruel.

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0210
rows.name:
Yes. Back then, the Qlu
totally believed the universe was filled with goodwill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0220
rows.name:
After realizing that was a mistake,
the Qlu became completely isolationist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0230
rows.name:
Since then, both technology and faith have been kept secret, and a strict,
controlled society was born[ST:wide ]— Or so they say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0240
rows.name: The reason I investigate ruins...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0250
rows.name:
Is to find traces of the technology spread by my ancestors
and take appropriate action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0260
rows.name: If ruins are still functioning, strive to preserve them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0265
rows.name: If it's being misused[ST:wide ]— destroy it promptly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0270
rows.name:
But anyway, this ring
seems to have completely ceased functioning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092905_MSG0280
rows.name: That's a relief just knowing it.[ST:wait ]
